name: Final Dungeon (Lucas Stark)
description:
We have defeated the Warlocks at great cost. We thought they were all gone, but there is one remaining. And he is planning to bring his kind back. We can't let that happen.

A small hack & slash prototype with a twist - there is only one enemy! After each battle he will grow in strength. Collect upgrades to make sure you are powerful enough to defeat him for good.

Made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2019.

Used software:

  • Unity 2019.1.9f1
  • Visual Studio
  • GIMP
